> Possible prommotion from Thief might be an Assassin...
> 
> Assassin
> Normal attack: throw-dagger, like thief
> 1st special: Cloak/Great Cloak [Great Cloak makes all onscreen 
allies 
> invisible, including the user]

Woo.  I would go for some limitations on how far the range of great 
cloak works.  In some large scenarios, there's no way an assasin in 
one corner of the map could effectively cloak a teammate in the 
opposite corner.

> 2nd special: Cluster Bomb [self explanatory]/Mega Bomb [a lot more 
 power than the standard bomb]

Hypothetical question: could an assasin create a mega bomb powerfull 
to kill itself even if the character is at full health?  A good way to 
handle mega bomb is to make it use a set percentage of the assasin's 
mana as opposed to a set amount of mana. 

[Yes, I'm a real fan of linking mana used for an attack directly to 
how much available mana a character has.]

> 3rd special: Steal equipment [disarms enemy and increases score]
> 4th special: Backstab [Either the fabled Insta-Death or a very large 
> amount of damage, BUT it only works at hand-to-hand range (i.e. next 
> to the poor sod it kills)]

Other than a few objections, this sounds like a really good promotion 
for a thief.
